ACEPTO_POLITICAS: I accept the privacy and data protection policy.
ACTIVIDAD_PRODUCTO: ¿What is the activity or product that you develop?
ALMACENA_AGUA: ¿How do you store or store water?
AREA_UFUNCIONAL: ¿What is the area in square meters?
ACCESO_ENTREGA: ¿How can you access the delivery point?
CONOCE_MOS: ¿Do you know the percentage of organic matter in the soil of this FU?
CONOCE_PH: ¿Do you know the pH of the soil in this plot?
CONOCE_PORCENTAJE: ¿Do you know the percentage of clay, silt and sand in your lot?*
COORDENADAS_ENTREGA: ¿Could you record the coordinates of the delivery point?
CUANTOS_TRABAJADORES: ¿How many workers are in your UP, including you?
CUANTOS_JORNALEROS: Of the total number of workers, ¿how many are day laborers?
CUANTOS_DISCAPACIDAD: ¿How many workers with disabilities are there in your UP?
CUANTOS_AFRO: ¿How many workers of Afro-descendant culture are there in your UP?
CUANTOS_MIGRANTES: ¿How many displaced workers, migrants or victims of the conflict are there in your UP?
CUANTOS_INDIGENA: ¿How many indigenous or ethnic population workers participate in your UP?
CONTROL_AGUA: ¿What control do you carry out on the water used in your UP?
DISTANCIA_FINCA: At what distance from your farm do you perceive good communication coverage for calls and internet?
DISPOSICION_RESIDUOS: ¿How do you dispose of organic waste in your UP?
DIVERISDAD_INSECTOS: Please upload an image showing the diversity of insects.*
ESTAMOS_MUY_FELICES: We are very happy to see you again.
FOTO_LOTE: Please upload a photo of your batch
FOTO_TERRENO: Please upload a photo of a hole in your soil from a depth until the small roots are finished
INSECTOS_COLOR: Of the insects collected in the yellow trap, what percentage looked like a wasp, bee, or ant?*
NOMBRE_UFUNCIONAL: Name of the agricultural functional unit
NUMERO_INSECTOS: ¿What was the total weight of the animals (earthworms, cockroaches, beetles ...) that came out of the earth SIs drying up?*
METODO_PH: ¿What method will you use, home or laboratory?*
ORIGEN_AGUA: ¿Where does the water come from to the farm?
PENDIENTE_TERRENO: ¿What is the slope of the lot?
PROFUNDIDAD_SUELO: ¿How deep in cm is the soil?
PORCENTAJE_MOS: ¿What is the percentage of organic matter in the soil (SOM)?
QUE_UF_TIENE: What Functional Units do you have?
RIEGO_AGUA: ¿What irrigation system do you use in your UP?
TEXTO1: Register now and enjoy a tool that will help you be more efficient in your day to day
TIPO_UNIDAD: ¿What type of agricultural activity is it?
TRAMPA_INSECTOS: ¿How many insects do you see in the light trap?*
